text: 8:33-35 Godɨn Araziba 11:29; 27:11-14Ezɨ Israelia bar, men gumazir dapaniba ko, ingangaribar faragh zuir gumaziba ko, men jasba ko, gumazamizir kantrin igharazibar izeziba, me bar ghua okoruar pumuningɨn tuifi. Israelian gumazamizir tuiviziba, marazi Gerisimɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn boroghɨn tuivizɨ, marazi Ebalɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn boroghɨn tuifi. Ezɨ ofa gamir gumaziba, me Livain anabamɨn adarasi, me Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim itir Boksiam gupugha izezɨma, Israelian okoruar pumuningɨn vong ko vongɨn tuivighav iti. Me uan guaba isa Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim itir Boksiam mɨsoke. Boksiar kam men torimra iti. Gumazamiziba Kenanɨn nguazimɨn otivigh, Ikiavɨra Itir God, deragh me damusɨ, me an ingangarir gumazim Moses mɨkemezɨ moghɨra, me bizibar amuam.
